com.cigital.insecurepay.common

Class PostAsyncCommonTask<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • com.cigital.insecurepay.common.AsyncCommonTask
        • com.cigital.insecurepay.common.PostAsyncCommonTask<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ForgotPasswordActivity.ForgotPasswordTask, LoginActivity.UserLoginTask

    public abstract class PostAsyncCommonTask<T>
extends AsyncCommonTask
    PostAsyncCommonTask extends AsyncCommonTask. This class is a parent class that is extended by any Activity/Fragment that wants to perform a Post request to the server.

        Parameters:
        contextObj - Contains the context of the parent activity.
        serverAddress - Contains the server url/address.
        path - Contains the sub-path to the service that needs to be used.
        objToBeSent - Data or Object of the class being sent to the server.
